{"id":942982192,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1682999257,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/942982192/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"First Completely Painted Row or Column","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    class pair{\n        int x;\n        int y;\n        pair(int x,int y){\n            this.x=x;\n            this.y=y;\n        }\n    }\n    public int firstCompleteIndex(int[] arr, int[][] mat) {\n        HashMap<Integer,pair> hm= new HashMap<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<mat.length;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<mat[0].length;j++){\n                pair pp= new pair(i,j);\n                hm.put(mat[i][j],pp);\n            }\n        }\n        int n=mat.length;\n        int m=mat[0].length;\n        int[] rowtotal=new int[n];\n        int[] coltotal=new int[m];\n        for(int i=0;i<arr.length;i++){\n            pair pp=hm.get(arr[i]);\n            int x=pp.x;\n            int y=pp.y;\n            rowtotal[x]++;\n            if(rowtotal[x]==n){\n                return i;\n            }\n            coltotal[y]++;\n            if(coltotal[y]==m){\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n        return 0;\n        \n\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"first-completely-painted-row-or-column","has_notes":false}
